      • angelInstantiator

        public void angelInstantiator​(int numberAngels)
        Name: angelInstantiator.
        This method make an array with the number of angels that the user is going to save.
        Pre: user has entered the number of angels that is going to save.
        Parameters:
        numberAngels - number of angels that is going to save in the array.
        Pos: array has been made.

      • angelCreator

        public java.lang.String angelCreator​(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String photo,
                                     java.lang.String prayer,
                                     int day,
                                     int month,
                                     java.lang.String power,
                                     java.lang.String color,
                                     double size,
                                     java.lang.String essence,
                                     double illuminance)
        Name: angelCreator.
        This method save an angel into the array.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the angel, that must finish on "el".
        photo - the direction where is the foto of the angel.
        prayer - the prayer of the angel.
        day - the day when is the celebration of the angel.
        month - the month when is the celebration of the angel.
        power - the power of the angel.
        color - the color of the candle for the angel.
        size - the size of the candle for the angel.
        essence - the essence of the candle for tha angel.
        illuminance - the iluminance of the candle for the angel.
        Pos: angel has been created.
        Returns:
        return a message saying if the angel has been created or happened an error

      • count

        public int count()
        Name: count.
        This count the number of angels saved.
        Pre: array must have a minimum of one angel.
        Pos: method has counted the number of angels saved.
        Returns:
        the method return the number of angels saved.

      • informationName

        public void informationName​(java.lang.String name)
        Name: informationName.
        This method shows the information of an angel by name.
        Pre: array must have a minimum of one angel.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the angel.
        Pos: information about the angel has been showed, if the angel doesn'n exist then show an error message.
